sentences.en: A gene that helps neutralize aluminum toxicity in rice has been identified.
sentences.cn: 目前,研究人员已经识别出一种有助于中和水稻里铝的毒性的基因.

sentences.en: a medicine that neutralizes the acid in the stomach
Acids neutralize alkalis and vice versa.
sentences.cn: 酸能使碱中和,碱亦能使酸中和.

sentences.en: Calcium oxide can neutralize peptic acid better than calcium carbonate.
sentences.cn: 氧化钙较碳酸钙能中和胃酸.

sentences.en: Do not mix with hot liquids since heat will neutralize active enzymes.
sentences.cn: 不可混合热饮,以免破坏其中多种活性酵素及活益菌成分.

sentences.en: Earth acupuncture is the process used to neutralize these fields.
sentences.cn: 地球针灸就是用于压制这些场的方法.

sentences.en: Find a way to neutralize Houston's screen and rolls.
sentences.cn: 找到一种对付休斯顿拆挡的办法.

sentences.en: He tried to neutralize the tremor in his voice by looking anywhere but at her face.
sentences.cn: 乔治的眼睛尽望别处,避开了她的脸,想抑制自己声音里的颤抖.

sentences.en: He was happiest whenever he could identify a threat and take steps to neutralize it.
sentences.cn: 每当他识别出一种威胁并采取措施消除它后,他就最快活了.

sentences.en: If you could neutralize the root cause, you could eliminate the problem.
sentences.cn: 如果你能使问题的根本原因失效, 你就能最终消除这个问题.

sentences.en: Neutralize or remove high concentrations of ammonia - based compounds in animal research facilities.
sentences.cn: 中和或清除动物研究场所中高浓度的氨基化合物.
不断上涨的物价会抵消工资的增长。

sentences.en: The alkalinity of water is a measure of its capacity to neutralize acids.
sentences.cn: 水的碱性是它中和酸的能力的一种量度.

sentences.en: The antibody can either neutralize the virus or activate the C system, which lyses virus - infected cells.
sentences.cn: 抗体或能中和病毒,或能活化补体系统以溶解病毒感染细胞.

sentences.en: The increase in indirect taxation is intended to neutralize the reduction in income tax.
sentences.cn: 增加间接税是为了抵消所得税的减少。

sentences.en: The latest figures should neutralize the fears of inflation.
sentences.cn: 最新的数据应该可以消除对通货膨胀的担忧。

sentences.en: The product is a specially formulated laundry sour to neutralize residual alkalinity.
sentences.cn: 本产品是一种配方独特的酸性中和剂,在洗衣最终过水时用于中和残留碱.

words.tran_cn: 中立的，中性的；中立国的；非彩色的
中立国；中立者；非彩色；齿轮的空档
[化学] 中和；[化学] 中和作用；中立状态
中立化（neutralize的过去式和过去分词）
抵销；使…中和；使…无效；使…中立

trans.tran_en: to make a substance chemically neutral

trans.tran_cn: 使中立化，使无效，宣布中立，中和
